original: @61a * // dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @61a * // dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajradhara.

original: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas me tog la @61b sogs pa dri zhim pos byugs la /
analyzed: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas me tog la @61b sogs pa dri zhim pos byugs la /
translated: The practitioner who is endowed with the commitments, desiring to perform the prosperity fire sacrifice, should anoint flowers, etc. with fragrant substances.

original: yang na gnas khang gi nang rnams su sa ser po'i lde gu'am pa'i lci ba gur gum gyi chus legs par sbyar la rtag tu byug par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gnas khang gi nang rnams su sa ser po'i lde gu'am pa'i lci ba gur gum gyi chus legs par sbyar la rtag tu byug par bya'o //
translated: Or, in the interior of the house, one should always anoint with a paste of yellow earth or cow dung well mixed with saffron water.

original: da nas rgyas pa'i thab khung gru bzhi pa /
analyzed: da nas rgyas pa'i thab khung gru bzhi pa /
translated: Now, the prosperity hearth is square,

original: ngos re la khru re yod pa kha khyer mtho gang gi tshad yod pa /
analyzed: ngos re la khru re yod pa kha khyer mtho gang gi tshad yod pa /
translated: one cubit on each side, with a rim one handspan high,

original: yar gyi dpangs su mthe bong gi sen mo la thug gi tshad la 'jim pa'i 'bur du rdo rjes khyab par dgod do //
analyzed: yar gyi dpangs su mthe bong gi sen mo la thug gi tshad la 'jim pa'i 'bur du rdo rjes khyab par dgod do //
translated: and one finger joint high, covered with a vajra boss.

original: de'i dbus su padma mdzub gang pa ser po 'bur du dod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su padma mdzub gang pa ser po 'bur du dod par bya'o //
translated: In the center of that, one should make a yellow finger-sized lotus boss.

original: de nyid kyi dpangs su sor bzhi pa brtsigs te byug spos ser po la sogs pas byug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi dpangs su sor bzhi pa brtsigs te byug spos ser po la sogs pas byug par bya'o //
translated: Having built it four finger joints high, one should anoint it with yellow incense paste, etc.

original: de ltar rgyas pa la ni rdzas ni mngar gsum dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar dang zho sbyar ba dang / til nag po dang / 'bras s'a lu skam po dang / zho sbyar ba la sogs pa gzung ste /
analyzed: de ltar rgyas pa la ni rdzas ni mngar gsum dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar dang zho sbyar ba dang / til nag po dang / 'bras s'a lu skam po dang / zho sbyar ba la sogs pa gzung ste /
translated: In this way, for the extensive [rite], one should take the substances: the three sweet [substances], honey, butter, and curd mixed together, black sesame seeds, dry sali rice, curd mixed together, and so forth.

original: bdag nyid bkra shis pa'i skyil mo krung gis kha shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid bkra shis pa'i skyil mo krung gis kha shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
translated: One should sit facing east in a self-auspicious cross-legged position.

original: yam shing ku sha dang kham bu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang / mngar dang ldan pa'i shing las bya ste /
analyzed: yam shing ku sha dang kham bu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang / mngar dang ldan pa'i shing las bya ste /
translated: The kindling should be made from kusha grass, fruits such as apricots, and sweet-tasting wood.

original: yam shing gi tshad ni sbom phra chag gang ba srid du khru gang pa zho dang mar sbyar bas byugs pa'o //
analyzed: yam shing gi tshad ni sbom phra chag gang ba srid du khru gang pa zho dang mar sbyar bas byugs pa'o //
translated: The size of the kindling is one cubit long, one finger thick, and smeared with curd and butter.

original: de yang nya'i snga dro nas phyi ma stong gi bar du nyin re la lan gsum bya'o //
analyzed: de yang nya'i snga dro nas phyi ma stong gi bar du nyin re la lan gsum bya'o //
translated: Moreover, this should be done three times a day, from the morning of the new moon until the full moon.

original: rgyal rigs sam ri la me shor ba las me blangs te /
analyzed: rgyal rigs sam ri la me shor ba las me blangs te /
translated: One should take fire from a fire that has spread from a fire on a mountain or from a royal family.

original: me lha sbyan drangs pa la sogs pa snga gong gis bya /
analyzed: me lha sbyan drangs pa la sogs pa snga gong gis bya /
translated: One should invite the fire god and so forth as before.

original: sreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: sreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o //
translated: One should offer the burnt substances.

original: sreg rdzas dbul ba la sogs pa'i dgang blugs ni gru bzhi pa phyi'i dbyibs gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu la rin po ches mtshan par dbul ba'o //
analyzed: sreg rdzas dbul ba la sogs pa'i dgang blugs ni gru bzhi pa phyi'i dbyibs gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu la rin po ches mtshan par dbul ba'o //
translated: The ladle-offering, such as the offering of the burning substances, is a square outer shape like the shape of a bow, offered with a jewel.

original: de ltar byas na tshe dang longs spyod 'khor dang sde la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas na tshe dang longs spyod 'khor dang sde la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does it in this way, life, enjoyments, retinue, army, and so forth will be expanded.

original: rgyud kyi rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig legs par sgrub pa /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig legs par sgrub pa /
translated: The word-by-word commentary on the expansion of the tantra.

original: rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi rgyas par byed pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so//
analyzed: rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi rgyas par byed pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so//
translated: The rite of the expansion-making fire sacrifice of Vajravidāraṇa is complete.
